_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: S1X
author: dominique@wellisch-itservice.de

installation.script:
echo "Install S1X debian linux" 

dpkg --add-architecture i386
apt-get update -y
apt-get install wine wine32 unzip git screen mono-devel curl wget -y

echo "### Downloading S1X ###"
export HOME=/mnt/server
wget -P /mnt/server/ https://wellisch-itservice.de/s1x.zip
cd /mnt/server && unzip -o s1x.zip
cd /mnt/server && rm s1x.zip

variables.name: Server Config
variables.description:
The configuration file the server will use
(Multiplayer  -> server.cfg)
(Zombie -> server_zm.cfg)
(Horde -> server_horde.cfg

variables.name: Zombie Mode
variables.description: Select Zombie CFG and Select this if you want zombies

variables.name: Horde Mode
variables.description: Select Horde config and select this if you want horde mode
